title: Single Of The Week: Lama – Flashes
body:
It’s been quiet here at Crack In The Road over the last few days and we apologise for this.

It’s just that we’re kidz with dreamz and other projects and shit; but still, if you feel neglected we’re sorry.

This week’s single of the week comes from the Norwegian group **Lama**, and it seems they’re moving in an entirely new direction. The new single, _Flashes_, is a pop tune to the very core. It’s succinct, catchy and has an immersive narrative strapped to its sleeve. It’s actually rather menacing at times; the blissful pop sounds clashing sublimely with the grimly optimistic lyrics are an interesting slant on the formula.

It also comes complete with a striking new video that could possibly point towards the inspiration for the piece. Check it out below.

[Lama – Flashes](http://vimeo.com/26101889) from [Lavafilm](http://vimeo.com/lavafilm) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
